page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT IN SHREWLEY
page.content:
In Shrewley village there is a song and dance hall, which is occasionally used. For main activities people go to War- wick or Leamington, eg. cinema or theatre. Often people gather together at each others homes,exchanging jokes, stories,listening to music or playing instruments. Most stay at home to watch television, video, play board games, charades, listen to the radio, sew, knit or read.
Some prefer walking or going to the local pub to play games like darts, snooker and cards. A few people go to Lapworth for Bingo. Kart-racing was one mans idea of enjoying life. Some families like showing their horses when there is spare time, or teaching the local children how to ride. There are monthly cheese & wine parties.
